#summary Features of Welly
#labels Featured

Welly exploits the power of Mac OS X for the best term BBS browsing experience.
See [http://welly.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/ReleaseNotes.html release notes] for latest updates.

= Fastest Text Rendering =

Based on the advanced [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Core_Text Core Text] technology in Mac OS X.

= Tabbed Browsing =

Display status indicators such as connections and the numbers of unread messages.

[http://welly.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/tab.jpg]

= Smart Recognition =

Multiline URL support.

= Image Preview =

Integrated with [http://www.apple.com/macosx/features/quicklook.html Quick Look].

[http://welly.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/preview.jpg]

= [http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apple_Remote Apple Remote] Support =

= Full Screen =

= Powerful Notifications =

Integrated with [http://growl.info/ Growl].

[http://welly.googlecode.com/svn/wiki/growl.jpg]

= Multi-Language Interface =

English, Simplified Chinese and Traditional Chinese support.

= Automatic Update =

Welly can check for updates on startup via [http://sparkle.andymatuschak.org/ Sparkle].

= IP Search =

Welly uses cz88's database to get the locations of IP addresses.

= Auto-Reply =

Welly can reply incoming messages automatically on your temporary leave.

= Super Download =

Welly can perform a smart full download of a post.
